description: The ability of the CloudBees Jenkins Platform to support the success of our customers and partners is predicated upon Jenkins' growth; it is the (automation) engine that drives the machine. To that end, CloudBees has and will continue to make a large investment in the success of Jenkins as the ubiquitous open-source tool of choice for continuous integration and continuous delivery. This session will provide an overview of the near-term and long-term initiatives CloudBees is driving in Jenkins.
title: CloudBees: Investing in the Future of Jenkins
